column2: its not that good! The prices wouldn't have mattered at all if the food was awesome. We got the Bull's Eye French Toast and the Los Drowned
column4: but for $30? Not really. The Bulls Eye was pretty substantial
column5: you get a lot of food here. But the chicken was dry and overcooked. You really needed the syrup to help it out. The egg was also overdone
column6: it would have been nice to have that yolk to sop up the excellently cooked french toast.
